title: Bug 101187: Blank localization key prevents externalized text from displaying in chart.
description:
Description: When the localization key is left blank, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the properties file.
2. Leave the key blank, but enter a valid value.
3. Save the file.
4. View the chart.

Observed result: The externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.

Expected result: The externalized text should be displayed in the chart title using the valid value provided in the properties file.
OB: The externalized text provided by the valid value in the properties file is not displayed in the chart title when the localization key is left blank.
EB: The externalized text should be displayed in the chart title using the valid value provided in the properties file, even when the localization key is left blank.
SR:
1. Open the properties file.
2. Leave the key blank, but enter a valid value.
3. Save the file.
4. View the chart and verify that the externalized text is correctly displayed in the chart title.
